img_above_text:
![Wukong Snowhill 22.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6c/Wukong_Snowhill_22.jpg)
Climbing the stairs, be sure to look to the left for some broken wooden platforms you can jump to, and beyond them you'll find a **Treasure Chest** containing items and likely a few Refined Iron Sand.
img_below_text:
Entering the large temple complex, there's actually not as much to explore as you might think. A large open area to the right leads to a sealed building, but guarding it is a new enemy - the Yaksha Patroller.
![Wukong Snowhill 24.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/bc/Wukong_Snowhill_24.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

Climbing the stairs, be sure to look to the left for some broken wooden platforms you can jump to, and beyond them you'll find a **Treasure Chest** containing items and likely a few Refined Iron Sand."
            - Following Text: "Entering the large temple complex, there's actually not as much to explore as you might think. A large open area to the right leads to a sealed building, but guarding it is a new enemy - the Yaksha Patroller.
![Wukong Snowhill 24.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/bc/Wukong_Snowhill_24.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character, Wukong, is engaged in combat with an enemy in a snowy temple courtyard. The preceding text suggests that the player has just navigated through broken wooden platforms to find a treasure chest, while the following text indicates that the player is about to encounter a new enemy, the Yaksha Patroller, in a large temple complex. This image serves to illustrate the challenging combat and exploration elements within the game.
